# PS4 Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon

`CUSA14390.savepatch`

### 1. Untested - Make sure to backup your save data first
### 2. Current Rank - Gain 10 XP to Rank Up

Target File: `*`

```
80010004 DA732F43
88010004 0006000B
28000004 05F5E0FF
```

### 3. MAX level: lvl 30

Target File: `*`

```
8001000D 474EC92E
00000000 00000600
0B000000 00000000
2800000D 0000001E
```

### 4. TIER: 40 (unlocks desert tech HTIBOC sniper)

Target File: `*`

```
80010004 35CC42F8
88010004 0006000B
28000004 05F5E0FF
8001000D F37629DC
00000000 00000600
0B000000 00000000
2800000D 0000000A
```
